title: FormalWear decrease in marginal product of workers

content.question: FormalWear is a clothing factory that hires workers as a variable input and rents sewing machines as a fixed input. Which of the following will happen when the marginal product of workers decreases?

choices.label: Short-run average total cost will decrease.
Marginal cost will equal average total cost.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
